TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit TypedReference extends System.ValueType

summary.span: Describes objects that contain both a managed pointer to a location and a runtime representation of the type that may be stored at that location.

span.span: Describes objects that contain both a managed pointer to a location and a runtime representation of the type that may be stored at that location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Un riferimento tipizzato è una combinazione di tipo/valore utilizzata per varargs e altre opzioni di supporto.A typed reference is a type/value combination used for varargs and other support. `TypedReference` è un tipo di valore incorporato che può essere utilizzato per i parametri e variabili locali.`TypedReference` is a built-in value type that can be used for parameters and local variables. Le matrici di `TypedReference` non è possibile creare oggetti.Arrays of `TypedReference` objects cannot be created. Ad esempio, la chiamata seguente non è valida:For example, the following call is invalid: [!code-cpp[System.TypedReference#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.typedreference/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.TypedReference#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.typedreference/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.TypedReference#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.typedreference/vb/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static TypedReference MakeTypedReference (object target, System.Reflection.FieldInfo[] flds);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype System.TypedReference MakeTypedReference(object target, class System.Reflection.FieldInfo[] flds) cil managed
Public Shared Function MakeTypedReference (target As Object, flds As FieldInfo()) As TypedReference
public: static TypedReference MakeTypedReference(System::Object ^ target, cli::array <System::Reflection::FieldInfo ^> ^ flds);
static member MakeTypedReference : obj * System.Reflection.FieldInfo[] -> TypedReference

param.name: target
param.span: An object that contains the field described by the first element of flds.

span.span: An object that contains the field described by the first element of flds.

param.name: flds
param.span: A list of field descriptions where each element describes a field that contains the field described by the succeeding element.

span.span: A list of field descriptions where each element describes a field that contains the field described by the succeeding element.

param.span: Each described field must be a value type.

span.span: Each described field must be a value type.

param.span: The field descriptions must be objects supplied by the type system.

span.span: The field descriptions must be objects supplied by the type system.

summary.span: Makes a for a field identified by a specified object and list of field descriptions.

span.span: Makes a for a field identified by a specified object and list of field descriptions.

returns.span: A for the field described by the last element of .

span.span: A for the field described by the last element of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il metodo viene restituito un riferimento tipizzato a un campo terminale, in cui la `target` parametro contiene il campo descritto dal primo elemento della `flds`, il campo descritto dal primo elemento della `flds` contiene il campo descritto dall'elemento della secondario `flds`, e così via fino a quando non viene raggiunto il campo terminal.The method returns a typed reference to some terminal field, where the `target` parameter contains the field described by the first element of `flds`, the field described by the first element of `flds` contains the field described by the second element of `flds`, and so on until the terminal field is reached. > [!NOTE] > Inizia con la [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], questo metodo può essere utilizzato per accedere a membri pubblici se il chiamante è stato concesso con il flag, se il set di autorizzazioni dei membri non pubblici è limitato al chiamante concedere set, oppure un subset della stessa.Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof. (Vedere [considerazioni sulla sicurezza per Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > Per usare questa funzionalità, l'applicazione deve essere destinata a [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] o versione successiva.To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.
